PPtreeExt 0.1.0

PPtreeExt

PPtreeExt is an R package that extends the PPtree algorithm for classification problems. The extentions allows to handle multiple splits per group and more complex structures than the original algorithm.

Installation

Install version from CRAN (not available yet!):

install.packages("PPTreeExt")

Install the development version from GitHub:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("natydasilva/PPtreeExt")

Simple Example 

n <- nrow(iris)
tot <- c(1:n)
n.train <- round(n*0.9)
train <- sample(tot,n.train)
test <- tot[-train]
Tree.result <- PPTreeclass_MOD(formula = Species~.,data = iris[train,],PPmethod = "LDA")
Tree.result
